publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3272 Angela Constance: St John’s Hospital Tic Talk Day Nursery’s Welly Waddle Fundraiser—That the Parliament congratulates the children and organisers of the Tic Talk Day Nursery at St John’s Hospital in Livingston for its Welly Waddle fundraising event that raised £1050.50 in support of the Scottish Cot Death Trust and acknowledges the very worthwhile work of the Scottish Cot Death Trust in its research into the causes of cot death and the support that it gives to families who have lost a baby through cot death.

S3M-3272 Angela Constance: St John’s Hospital Tic Talk Day Nursery’s Welly Waddle Fundraiser—That the Parliament congratulates the children and organisers of the Tic Talk Day Nursery at St John’s Hospital in Livingston for its Welly Waddle fundraising event that raised £1,050.50 in support of the Scottish Cot Death Trust and acknowledges the very worthwhile work of the Scottish Cot Death Trust in its research into the causes of cot death and the support that it gives to families who have lost a baby through cot death.
